title: PaaS Market in South America to Grow at a CAGR of 15.15% till 2018
text:
The report titled PaaS Market - South America Outlook (2014-18) showcases an in-depth analysis of the APJ market in terms of market size and its respective market forces. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2018 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
The report brings about a detailed description of the global industry landscape, the global market forces (drivers, constraints, opportunities and challenges), metrics and market share for the PaaS market.
Growth in Mobile Broadband Penetration to Facilitate PaaS
South America region is lagging in overall cloud adoption when compared to other geographic regions. This is mainly because of the lack of infrastructure and awareness about cloud computing. The cloud adoption is happening only in technologically advanced regions of South America where cloud infrastructure is in place. Adoption rate of PaaS is very slow in these regions mainly because of language barrier. The education system and the companies are adopting new approaches to overcome this problem. Companies are improving their platform by supporting more languages like Portuguese, Spanish etc.
Vendor lock-in is one of the challenges of this market. However, with lower customer attrition, the region is expected to be technology-aware in the near future.
